!INDEX.html              Long index format
GRkbd-1.2.tar.gz         various keyboards for different places worldwide
br_map.tgz               Brazilian keyboard map
cf.map.gz                French Canadian keyboard map
console-data-1999.04.15.tar.gz Keymaps, console fonts, and various tables for the Linux console
console-tools-0.2.0.tar.gz programs for keyboard, console fonts and virtual terminals manipulation
console-tools-1999.03.02.tar.gz programs for keyboard, console fonts and virtual terminals manipulation
cse.tar.gz               Linux native console font editor
diacrd-brazilian-0.31.1.tgz keyboard mappings suitable for Brazilian use
diacrd-french-0.01.tar.gz transforms dead keys of French keyboard for X
diacrd-usintl-0.31.tar.gz maps dead keys on US keyboard into diacriticals
diacrd-usx-0.02.tgz      transforms diacritical US keys for X
edt-vt100-kbd-1.05.tar.gz scripts to use Emacs in VAX-VMS-EDT mode
ethiopic.tgz             support for Ethiopic syllabary on console
fontpack.tgz             additional console fonts for kbd-0.8x
french-canadian-xkb-0.2.tar.gz French-canadian configuration files for xkb
german-hackers-keymap    German keyboard map
greek-2.0.tar.gz         greek fonts, keymaps, and filters
itkbd-ibm.tgz            map for original IBM(c) PC italian keyboards
itkbd.tar.gz             Italian keyboard map
kbd-0.99.tar.gz          Keyboard and console utilities for Linux
keybsg.tgz               Singapore keyboard map
linux-lt-1.15.tar.gz     Lithuanian keyboard mapping
magic-keyboard-0.1.tar.gz allows you to use one physical keyboard with several linux machines
ru_win.map               Windows Cyrillic keyboard layout
se-lat1.map              Swedish Latin-1 keyboard map
us-latin1_map.tgz        Keymap definition file for United States keyboards and Latin 1 character set
vn-console-0.12.tgz      Vietnamese VISCII 1.1 encoding on the Linux console
